subject: re:Order now and don't forget about a discount
body:
Dear customer.
Various medical associations warn us about the growing problem of drug falsification. If you want to know how to avoid being sold fake medications, red this letter to the end.
Our Canadian online pharmacy is happy to offer USA citizens to resort to the services of our e-shop located at CanadianPharmacy. We are the only Canadian Web pharmacy regularly monitored by FDA. CanadianPharmacy all the generic drugs that you might need for less.
CanadianPharmacy the easiest and the cheapest way to take care of your health.
Yours faithfully,Juan Nava
